errorStrategy.title: Error strategy
errorStrategy.description: Strategy applied to handle rate-limiting internal errors.

enumLabelMap.BLOCK_ON_INTERNAL_ERROR: Block queries in case of internal failure
enumLabelMap.FALLBACK_PASS_TROUGH: Accept queries in case of internal failure (previous default behavior)

async.title: Non-strict mode (async)
async.description: By activating this option, spike limit is applied in an asynchronous way meaning that the distributed counter value is not strict (backend can receive more queries than configured).

addHeaders.title: Add response headers
addHeaders.description: Add X-Spike-Arrest-Limit, X-Spike-Arrest-Remaining and X-Spike-Arrest-Reset headers in HTTP response

key.title: Key
key.description: Key to identify a consumer against whom the quota will be applied. Leave it empty to use the default behavior. Supports EL.

useKeyOnly.title: Use key only
useKeyOnly.description: Only uses the custom key to identify the consumer, regardless of the subscription and plan.

limit.title: Max requests (static)
limit.description: Static limit on the number of requests that can be sent (this limit is used if the value > 0).

dynamicLimit.title: Max requests (dynamic)
dynamicLimit.description: Dynamic limit on the number of requests that can be sent (this limit is used if static limit = 0). The dynamic value is based on EL expressions.

periodTime.title: Static time duration
periodTime.description: If defined, will be used instead of 'Dynamic time duration'.

dynamicPeriodTime.title: Dynamic time duration (Supports EL)
dynamicPeriodTime.description: The 'Static time duration' must be empty to use the dynamic period. The time unit is set to SECONDS by default.
